SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.CustomerType , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
, M1.Name as CustomerTypeName , BB.BizName , BB.RepName , BB.BizNo
, EE.Name as EmployeeName , DD.Name as DepartmentName
FROM dbo.TCustomer AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B1.CustomerID , B1.BusinessID , B2.Name as BizName , B2.RepName as RepName , B2.BizNo as BizNo FROM dbo.TCustomerBusiness B1 INNER JOIN dbo.TBusiness B2 ON B1.BusinessID = B2.ID WHERE B1.StartDate < DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE()) AND ISNULL(B1.EndDate, GETDATE()) > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()) ) BB ON AA.ID = BB.CustomerID LEFT JOIN dbo.TCustomerManager CM WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = CM.CustomerID AND CM.StartDate < DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE()) AND ISNULL(CM.EndDate, GETDATE()) > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()) LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON CM.EmployeeID = EE.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TAppointment FF WITH (NOLOCK) ON CM.EmployeeID = FF.EmployeeID AND FF.StartDate < DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE()) AND ISNULL(FF.EndDate, GETDATE()) > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()) AND FF.MainYn = 'Y' LEFT JOIN dbo.TDepartment DD WITH (NOLOCK) ON FF.DepartmentID = DD.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CustomerType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'CustomerType' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND AA.CustomerType = #CustomerType#
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TCustomer AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TCustomer SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , CustomerType = #CustomerType# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description#
WHERE ID = #ID#
